Package com.ibm.portal.samples.common

The package contains some helper concepts that can be reused across different portlets.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AbstractView.Dependencies Dependencies of the bean
Marshaller Abstraction of the encoding aspect of portlet render parameters and action parameters.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMarshaller Convenience base class for marshallers.
AbstractView Base class for view beans.
PrivateParameterMarshaller Marshaller for private render parameters.
PublicParameterMarshaller Marshaller for public render parameters.
 

Package com.ibm.portal.samples.common Description

The package contains some helper concepts that can be reused across different portlets.
